:defaultValue.description: Set the initial value. When 'range' is false, use number, otherwise use [number, number]
:defaultValue.description_zh: 设置初始取值。当 `range` 为 false 时，使用 number，否则用[number, number]

disabled.description: When the value is true, the slider is disabled
disabled.description_zh: 值为 true 时，滑块为禁用状态

keyboard.description: The handler can be operated using the keyboard
keyboard.description_zh: 支持使用键盘操作 handler

dots.description: Whether you can only drag and drop onto the scale
dots.description_zh: 是否只能拖拽到刻度上

included.description: marks is valid when the object is not empty, true indicates that the value is contained, and false indicates a tie
included.description_zh: marks 不为空对象时有效，值为 true 时表示值为包含关系，false 表示并列

:marks.description: For tick markers, the type of key must be 'number' and the value must be in the closed interval [min, max], and each label can be styled separately
:marks.default: { number: ReactNode } or { number: { style: CSSProperties, label: ReactNode } }
:marks.description_zh: 刻度标记，key 的类型必须为 `number` 且取值在闭区间 [min, max] 内，每个标签可以单独设置样式

:step.description: Step size, which must be greater than 0 and divisible by (max - min). When 'marks' is not an empty object, you can set 'step' to null, and the only optional values in the slider are marks, min and max
:step.description_zh: 步长，取值必须大于 0，并且可被 (max - min) 整除。当 `marks` 不为空对象时，可以设置 `step` 为 null，此时 Slider 的可选值仅有 `marks`、`min` 和 `max`

:tooltip.description_zh: 设置 Tooltip 相关属性

:value.description: Set the current value. When 'range' is false, use number, otherwise use [number, number]
:value.description_zh: 设置当前取值。当 `range` 为 false 时，使用 number，否则用[number, number]

vertical.description: When the value is true, the Slider is vertical
vertical.description_zh: 值为 true 时，Slider 为垂直方向

:trackStyle.description_zh: Slider 滑动条轨道样式 (选中范围内)

:railStyle.description_zh: Slider 滑动条轨道样式 (背景)

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

events.name: onChangeComplete
events.description: Consistent with the mouseup and keyup trigger timing, passing the current value as a parameter
events.description_zh: 与 mouseup 和 keyup 触发时机一致，把当前值作为参数传入

events.name: onChange
events.description: When the value of the slider changes, the onChange event is triggered, and the changed value is passed as a parameter
events.description_zh: 当 Slider 的值发生改变时，会触发 onChange 事件，并把改变后的值作为参数传入

range.name: draggableTrack
range.description: Whether range scale can be dragged
range.description_zh: 范围刻度是否可被拖拽

range.name: editable
range.description: Enable dynamic add/remove nodes, can't be used with draggableTrack
range.description_zh: 启动动态增减节点，不能和 draggableTrack 一同使用

range.name: minCount
range.description: Minimum number of nodes when editable is configured
range.description_zh: 配置 editable 时，最小节点数量

range.name: maxCount
range.description: Maximum number of nodes when editable is configured
range.description_zh: 配置 editable 时，最大节点数量

tooltip.name: autoAdjustOverflow
tooltip.description: Whether to automatically adjust popup position
tooltip.description_zh: 是否自动调整弹出位置

tooltip.name: open
tooltip.description: When true, Tooltip will always be displayed; otherwise never displayed, even when dragging and hovering
tooltip.description_zh: 值为 true 时，Tooltip 将会始终显示；否则始终不显示，哪怕在拖拽及移入时

tooltip.name: placement
tooltip.description: Set Tooltip display position. See Tooltip component
tooltip.description_zh: 设置 Tooltip 展示位置。参考 Tooltip

tooltip.name: getPopupContainer
tooltip.description: Tooltip rendering parent node, default renders to body
tooltip.description_zh: Tooltip 渲染父节点，默认渲染到 body 上

tooltip.name: formatter
tooltip.description: Slider passes current value to formatter and displays formatter's return value in Tooltip. If null, hides Tooltip
tooltip.description_zh: Slider 会把当前值传给 formatter，并在 Tooltip 中显示 formatter 的返回值，若为 null，则隐藏 Tooltip
